title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 161.4 - Location
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 161.4 - Location

State Regulations
(a) Records shall
be made available at the main office of the department, which is located at: 6

Empire State Plaza, Albany, NY 12228. (b) Whenever practicable, personal history
files of employees shall be made available to employees at any office of this
department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
161.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
